name: Transparent
description:
All you need to do is get enough still reference images of the old place with your trusty camera quick as you can, get back to the van, get home and get paid. The second-unit crew will be on location today, but you don't need to interact with them at all. You've got a job to do, they'll just slow you down, and that one sound guy has no end of photography puns. 

Warning: MAY BE TOO OLD-SCHOOL TEXT-ADVENTUREY FOR THE FAINT OF HEART. Includes sound and occasional graphics when played in a multimedia interpreter - download links below.
